overview: Sentimental and costumbrist drama. "Triumphant production of Colombia Films. Starring Italian actress Mara Meba. The beautiful landscapes that are admired are copied with taste of the charms of the Cauca land and the one of a group of seagulls in the Cauca river is a surprising effect and that much would like to have them the European movies". (Diario del Comercio Newspaper, August 26, 1926)
title: Tuya es la culpa
